extension.summary: Play media off the Icelandic Public Radio's website
extension.description: An Icelandic IP-Address is required to use this because of geoblocking
extension.news:
Version 5.0 (2021-02-23) - Upgraded to Python 3 for Kodi 19 compatibility - Fixed podcast scraping
Version 4.4 - Add subtitles when available to playable list items
Version 4.3.1 - Handle error when program title missing
Version 4.3.0 - Add featured and categories. Add context menu. - Only display program episode if program has episodes - Localization
Version 4.2.0 - Use streams instead of direct URLs (sindrig) - Fixed search (sindrig)
Version 4.1.0 - Fixed the podcast index - Fixed duration times - Fixed live streams - Added a live stream menu
